text: Mice. Eight-week-old specific-pathogen-free BALB/c Ola Hsd female mice were purchased from Harlan Laboratories and maintained for 8 additional weeks in the animal care facility at the National Center of Biotechnology (Madrid). For infection experiments, mice were anesthetized with isoflurane and intranasally inoculated at 16 weeks of age with 100,000 PFU of the indicated viruses. All work with infected animals was performed in a biosafety level 3ϩ (BSL3ϩ) laboratory (CISA, INIA) by technicians wearing personal protection equipment (3M).
